bookTitle: The Scar (A Faking Delinquency bonus chapter)
Plot: “Elisa! Are you deaf? I said get your fat ass out here!” For years now this has been the norm for Will. His step-father would come home drunk and start a fight with his mom. This time, however, something doesn’t feel right. Things get a little too intense that Will may just have to take matters into his own hands.
